scripts.sbr:reset: node scripts/confirm-reset.js && bun supabase db reset --linked && node scripts/project-names.js
scripts.sbr:typegen: bun supabase gen types typescript --linked --schema public > ../../packages/types/src/supabase.ts && node ./scripts/sort-types.js && biome format --write ../../packages/types/src/supabase.ts
scripts.sbr:sync: bun supabase db push --linked && bun supabase db pull --linked
scripts.sb:typegen: bun supabase gen types typescript --local --schema public > ../../packages/types/src/supabase.ts && node ./scripts/sort-types.js && biome format --write ../../packages/types/src/supabase.ts
scripts.sb:sync: bun supabase db push && bun supabase db pull
scripts.sb:linkpush: bun supabase link && bun supabase db push
